short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to access the power of the Whistic Knowledge Base

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Harness the power of Whistic AI with the Knowledge Base plugin!
Now you can easily query security and compliance documentation and self-assessment questionnaires stored in Whistic Knowledge Base directly from your browser.
 * Get answers to security questions fast! Simply ask a question and the Knowledge Base plug-in returns the resultsâ€“without needing to switch screens.
 * Take the burden off Infosec: Give your internal teams an easy way to get specific answers to customer questions without needing to ask for help.

About Whistic
The Whistic platform gives Infosec teams the power to run world-class third-party risk management and customer trust programs with a unified, AI-powered experience that streamlines both sides of the vendor risk assessment process.
Knowledge Base is core component of the Whistic platform and helps you store, organize, and intelligently search your security and compliance documentation.

Not a Whistic customer? Visit https://www.whistic.com/whistic-ai to learn how Whistic AI makes it easy to provide accurate responses to security questions. If you need help, email support@whistic.com.
